entry.title: Viper Compression Shorts
entry.summary:
Vendor: XMARTIAL
Type: Men - Compression Shorts
Price: 42.00

Do yourself a favor and let out your inner spirit animal in this Viper Compression Shorts if how you look affects how you feel. This is the ideal inspired short that will increase your workouts and mood as you achieve your goals. Every time you put it on, you'll achieve new personal records and push yourself to new heights thanks to your newfound abilities!

  • Made of high-elastic lycra and polyester fabric

  • Compressed fitness shorts, closely fit your body

  • Variety of patterned designs

  • Super comfortable as it features 4-way stretch performance fabric

  • Designed for maximum comfort and unimpeded range of motion

    For Men
    ➤ Viper Rash Guard
    ➤ Viper Shortsleeve Rash Guard
    ➤ Viper BJJ/MMA Shorts
